name: Slinky
description:
Have you ever known people who are too attached to their cats? Escape them and a dastardly Roomba in this simple 2D top down stealth game.

Jam Site: 
An Australia Global Game Jam 2021

Jam Year: 
2021

Platforms: 
Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product)

Technology Notes: 
FMOD

Credits:

Natasha J. Fei - Sound Designer
Priyam Jain - Programmer, Designer
